alert.note: Alert for Hardee; Highlands; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Highlands, northeastern Hardee and southeastern Polk Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 728 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Avon Park to near Wauchula. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winter Haven, Bartow, Lake Wales, Avon Park, Crooked Lake Park, Dundee, Frostproof, Eagle Lake, Lake Hamilton, Hillcrest Heights, Highland Park, Alturas, Indian Lake Estates, River Ranch, Cypress Gardens, Lake Wales Municipal Airport, Babson Park, Bartow Municipal Airport, Wahneta and Waverly. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
